videos.title: Travis Scott - FE!N (2024)
videos.description: The music video for "Fe!n" by Travis Scott featuring Playboi Carti was released on March 30, 2024, on Scott's YouTube channel via Vevo and directed by Gabriel Moses. The song itself, part of Scott's album "Utopia," has been praised for its unique composition and contributions from both artists, showcasing a new vocal delivery by Carti and Scott's titular chorus.

videos.title: Usher, H.E.R. - Risk It All (2024)
videos.description: In the 2024 music video 'Risk It All' directed by Dave Meyers, Usher and H.E.R. deliver an emotionally charged performance, underscored by contemporary dance, on a rotating platform in a dimly lit setting. The video, known for its sophisticated yet steamy ambiance, culminates in a poignant moment with Usher tearfully singing the final note. This collaboration is a standout part of 'The Color Purple' soundtrack, showcasing the artistic depth and vulnerability of both artists.
videos.additional_info:
Usher, H.E.R. - Risk It All (2024)
In the 2024 music video 'Risk It All' directed by Dave Meyers, Usher and H.E.R. deliver an emotionally charged performance, underscored by contemporary dance, on a rotating platform in a dimly lit setting. The video, known for its sophisticated yet steamy ambiance, culminates in a poignant moment with Usher tearfully singing the final note. This collaboration is a standout part of 'The Color Purple' soundtrack, showcasing the artistic depth and vulnerability of both artists.
Technique - Echo print , Lazy Susan , Motion Blur , Speed Ramp , Stationary camera
Director - Dave Meyers
DOP - Scott Cunningham
Editor - Nathan Rodgers
Colorist - Pavel Marko
Original Source - Link

videos.title: 21 Savage - redrum (2024)
videos.description: The music video for "Redrum" by 21 Savage, featured on his album "American Dream," is directed by Danny Seth and showcases a return to the artist's roots in London. It contrasts iconic landmarks with the grittier areas of Brixton, symbolizing the song's themes. The track itself, produced by London on da Track, samples "Serenata do Adeus" and incorporates elements from "The Shining," including the famous line "Here's Johnny!" Despite some opinions that the video could have more directly referenced "The Shining's" iconic scenes, it has been well-received for its artistic representation and Savage's performance.
videos.additional_info:
21 Savage - redrum (2024)
The music video for "Redrum" by 21 Savage, featured on his album "American Dream," is directed by Danny Seth and showcases a return to the artist's roots in London. It contrasts iconic landmarks with the grittier areas of Brixton, symbolizing the song's themes. The track itself, produced by London on da Track, samples "Serenata do Adeus" and incorporates elements from "The Shining," including the famous line "Here's Johnny!" Despite some opinions that the video could have more directly referenced "The Shining's" iconic scenes, it has been well-received for its artistic representation and Savage's performance.
Technique - Dutch Angle , Jump cut , Speed Ramp
Director - Danny Seth
DOP - Chewy Lodge, JAWMIDNIGHT, Thomas Marchese
Editor - Anders Mills, Trim Editing
Colorist - Vlad Barin
Original Source - Link

videos.title: M.I.A. 'Bad Girls' (2012)
videos.description: M.I.A.'s "Bad Girls" music video is a visually stunning showcase of Saudi-inspired car stunts, with drifting vehicles on two wheels and empowered women in a desert setting, blending Middle Eastern cultural elements with modern rebellion. Directed by Romain Gavras, the video highlights themes of female empowerment and defiance, all set against a backdrop of high-octane action and surreal imagery.
videos.additional_info:

videos.alt_text: Joost, Ski Aggu & Otto Waalkes - Friesenjung
videos.title: Joost, Ski Aggu & Otto Waalkes - Friesenjung (2023)
videos.description: The music video for "Friesenjung" by Joost, Ski Aggu, and Otto Waalkes presents a playful and humorous visual narrative that complements the lighthearted and catchy tune of the song. It features a variety of quirky scenes that highlight the cultural and comedic elements typical of Otto Waalkes' performances, blended with the musical styles of Joost and Ski Aggu, creating a unique and entertaining fusion.
videos.additional_info:

videos.title: ONHA - KODAK (2024)
videos.description: The music video for "Kodak" by ONHA, directed by Nitram, showcases the artist moving through different lively and surreal environments that correspond to playlists on a girl's phone. In one standout scene, ONHA is turned into a basketball, remaining the focal point during a game. The video is praised for its ambitious concept and impressive visual effects, making it a visually captivating experience.

videos.additional_info:
Nike - More than Warmth (2023)
In a magical icy lab, a team of eccentric researchers tests the Nike Winter Collection for warmth, breathability, and waterproof features, celebrating their success in a captivating product demonstration. Each film segment highlights specific jacket attributes, culminating in a showcase of the collection's excellence. videos.title: The Dare - Perfume (2024)
videos.description: The "The Dare - Perfume 2024" commercial is an evocative and visually striking advertisement that captures the essence of boldness and sensuality. It features a series of elegantly choreographed scenes where the protagonist moves through various luxurious settings, exuding confidence and allure. The commercial employs a rich color palette and dramatic lighting to highlight the sophistication and intensity of the perfume. The narrative is punctuated by close-up shots of the perfume bottle, emphasizing its sleek design and the brand's logo, leaving a lasting impression of elegance and daring on the viewer.
videos.additional_info:

The commercial employs a rich color palette and dramatic lighting to highlight the sophistication and intensity of the perfume. videos.title: Watchtower of Turkey (2014)
videos.description: Described as a visual masterpiece, "Watchtower of Turkey" is praised for its breathtaking cinematography, dynamic soundtrack, and impeccable editing. The film takes viewers through vibrant cities and awe-inspiring landscapes, showcasing the country's remarkable diversity and beauty. It's more than just a travel video; it's a tribute to Turkey's rich culture, history, and natural wonders, crafted with an eye for detail and a knack for storytelling.
videos.additional_info:

videos.title: AJ Tracey - Bubble Bath (2024)
videos.description: The music video for "Bubble Bath" by AJ Tracey, released in 2024, is set in a lively West London nail shop, directed by LateMilk. The video features vibrant, energetic scenes that reflect the song's upbeat and catchy vibe. It highlights the fusion of contemporary urban culture with playful, colorful visuals, showcasing AJ Tracey in various stylish setups, interacting with people in the nail shop, and performing the song with charisma and flair. The setting and visuals create a fun, engaging atmosphere that complements the track's infectious rhythm and lyrics.
videos.additional_info:

videos.title: Watchtower of Turkey (2014)
videos.description: Described as a visual masterpiece, "Watchtower of Turkey" is praised for its breathtaking cinematography, dynamic soundtrack, and impeccable editing. The film takes viewers through vibrant cities and awe-inspiring landscapes, showcasing the country's remarkable diversity and beauty. It's more than just a travel video; it's a tribute to Turkey's rich culture, history, and natural wonders, crafted with an eye for detail and a knack for storytelling.
videos.additional_info:
Watchtower of Turkey (2014)

The film takes viewers through vibrant cities and awe-inspiring landscapes, showcasing the country's remarkable diversity and beauty. Director - Leonardo Dalessandri

videos.alt_text: Pa Salieu - My Family feat BackRoad Gee
videos.title: Pa Salieu - My Family feat BackRoad Gee (2020)
videos.additional_info:
Pa Salieu - My Family feat BackRoad Gee (2020)
Music video for British rapper Pa Salieu, from director Femi Ladi. Utilizes a bolt arm camera that was popularized in Kendrick Lamar's 2017 music video, Humble, by director Dave Meyers. Ladi's decision to use a black and white color scheme gives this film an interesting juxtaposition between a timeless look, and modern camera techniques, with the help of the bolt arm.
Technique - Quick Cuts , Speed Ramp
Director - Femi Ladi
DOP - Stefan Yap

videos.title: Face (2021)
videos.additional_info:
Face (2021)
The 2021 trailer for Jessica Helfand's book FACE, directed by Lake Buckley and Dayday, was produced for its release by MIT Press. The production team behind the trailer included Nicolas Thau as the producer, Harry Walters as the production manager, and Charlotte Arnoux handling casting. Mayer Chalom was the director of photography, with Davide Sorasio and Emma Penrose assisting as 1st and 2nd AC respectively.
Technique - 1800s , Archival , Quick Cuts , Shadow Box , Speed Ramp
Director - dayday, Lake Buckley
DOP - Mayer Chalom
Editor - Mah Ferraz

videos.title: Aminé - Charmander (2021)
videos.description: In the 2021 music video "Charmander" by Aminé, the artist retreats to a secluded cabin in the woods, symbolizing a quest for peace and introspection away from the pressures of fame. The video is characterized by a warm, earthy color palette and natural light, capturing the tranquil beauty of the forest setting. The nostalgic reference to Pokémon through the title "Charmander" adds a whimsical contrast to the mature themes of self-discovery and isolation.
